name: Tvori
description: Create animated stories in Virtual Reality. Making scenes and animating characters becomes fun and simple with Tvori.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 570 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070, AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 equivalent or better Storage: 1 GB available space
